name: Gachaminer
storyline: You start as a Newbie to Crypto and Bitcoin, in a free and empty appartment you get at the beginning. A Friend will teach you about Crypto Mining in a Tutorial Storyline. Afterwards, you can learn more about Bitcoin, Crypto and Blockchain in General and Mining in multiple Storylines, Missions. You can travel a persistant world and see other players and can interact with them.
summary: Gachaminer is a Crypto Mining MMORPG. Learn about Mining and Crypto in Storylines and Missions, and play with thousands of other players in a persistent multiplayer world.
